content:
Hi all. The tech teamâ€™s evening agenda this week is:

  • Mon: reference implementations (on the printed schedule)

  • Tues: presenting profiles more effectively (+FPL)

  • Wed: formal modelling proposals for FHIR - @thomas Beale

  • Thurs: (after round table) ig tooling alignment and snapshot generation

If you want to attend the Tuesday or Wednesday meeting, please let me know directly. (The meetings are actually open but we have limited space)
@Grahame Grieve I would like to attend Tuesday evening discussion. Where and when is that going to be held?
ok. add you to me list and pm'ed details
(deleted)
:+1:
Count me in for all evening sessions if space available ;)
I'm in for Tuesday, please.
ok got you guys
I'd like to join Tuesday if possible. Wednesday seems interesting too but just by reading the title I can't figure out. I'll inquire. Sadly I'll miss Thursday

Wednesday evening is to talk about Tom' blog posts: https://wolandscat.net/2019/09/12/fhir-fixes-the-observation-value-problem/ and https://wolandscat.net/2019/09/11/fixes-for-fhir-the-admin-resources/
@Grahame Grieve I'm counting on you to continue to tell me where to go, as you've been doing :slight_smile: (I have recorded the things you've told me already)
I'd like to join all three!
hmm. where are you now?
Lloyd's IG session, just wrapping up
then heading to FHIR-I (is it Imperial Salon A or 1132?)
Thanks, will update confluence
Did it move? Was there a change? @Lloyd McKenzie is expressing surprise.
What floor are you on?
it's on the post-it board. @Yunwei Wang showed me. I don't know why
thanks!
updated

@Dave deBronkart:

  • Mon Q3: nothing really compelling - maybe Parlor 1107 - CBCP, Security: security reports
  • Mon Q4: probably Parlor 1114 - PC: IPS
  • Tues Q1: nothing compelling - maybe Parlour 1108 Patient Admin planning
  • Tues Q2: Parlor 1108 - PA - Patient Merge & consequences?
  • Tues Q3: Parlor 1107 - CBCP, Security - Consent project
  • Tues Q4: Imperial Salon A - PC, CQI, Vocab, PA - patient care issues
I would like to attend all sessions if space is available.

Wednesday evening is to talk about Tom' blog post

I'd like to join Tuesday and Wednesday then, if possible.
Imperial Salon A for FHIR-I tracker discussion.
I'll be there on Wed evening
